text: Devadasi is a 1999 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Biju Varkey, starring Nishanth Sagar and Jeneesha in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_devadasi.htm == Cast == * Abitha * Nishanth Sagar * Nedumudi Venu * Bharath Gopi * M.
